article.author: G Adventures
article.title: Stay home. Stay kind. Stay connected.
article.lead: Travel teaches us that we’re stronger when we come together. And that’s never been more true.
article.body: G Adventures can’t wait to share our big, beautiful world with you again. Our world deserves more you.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/g5m9QzrFMqc?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Globus Family of Brands
article.title: Dreaming Doesn't Stop
article.lead: We may have been temporarily relegated to armchair travelers, but we are still travelers!
article.body: Like the geysers of Yellowstone and the peaks of the Andes, we will rise – and the world will shine. Until the day comes when the Globus Family of Brands can resume the joy of being your global guide, keep dreaming. We certainly are.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2-l6OttmJfc?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>
